Event Details:

Join us for our next chess meetup for a fantastic chess spirit!

Whether you’re a seasoned player or just discovering your love for the game, come embrace the thrill of chess, forge new connections, and make every move count.

Mark your calendar, bring your passion for chess, and get ready to create some remarkable memories with fellow chess enthusiasts.We can`t wait to see you at “Chess Connect”!

What’s Included:

  • 3 Hours of Blitz Chess (Format 5+3)
  • Special Prizes for the Top 3 Players
  • Chance to Win Premium Chess Sets from Paramount Chess through a Lucky Draw
  • Chance to Win a Chess.com Diamond Membership through Lucky Draw
